name: Improvised Wizard
description:
Improvised Wizard is a game created for the mashup game jam 2. it's about a wizard who must make his way through a dungeon by improvising spells with a less than ideal weapon.

I hope you all enjoy my entry into the jam. I appreciate all feed back, especially constructive criticism. Thanks for taking the time to try my game!

Controls:
W or Space: Jump
A and D: Move Left and Right
S: Fall through certain platforms
Mouse: Aim
L. Click: Cast spell
Shift: Use door
ESC: Exit full screen
